parameters.text:
Hi! I’m Denis Khramov, a Visual & Motion Designer focused on making interactive interfaces. I enjoy turning ideas into experiences you can see and touch - through thoughtful motion, clear UI, and prototypes.

I’ve spent the past seven years at Ford Motor Company as a product and interface designer on various HMI and in-vehicle experience projects, and over twelve years before that working across freelance roles in product design, UI visual / motion design, and 3D visualization. Each project has taught me something new - and I try to carry that forward into every next one.

parameters.Title: Florida Hospital  "Someday Starts Today"
parameters.Description: In collaboration with Aggressive and Loop Design Studios, I served as the UI Concept Designer on a five-spot campaign for Florida Hospital, creating interface design elements and holographic visuals.

parameters.Title: Lincoln Nautilus / Navigator 2024
parameters.Description:
Visual, prototyping, and concept design for the HMI of Lincoln’s new generation Nautilus and Navigator 2024.
The new generation is distinguished by an advanced 48-inch panoramic display that spans the entire dashboard, integrating both the instrument cluster and infotainment into a seamless, driver-focused interface.

parameters.Title: Lincoln Zephyr 2022/23
parameters.Description: Visual, prototyping, and concept design for the Lincoln Zephyr 2022 HMI, featuring 27-inch panoramic display. Launched in China in 2021

parameters.Title: KPMG "Change"
parameters.Description: For KPMG we crafted an experiential film that’s all about contrasts — small to large, dark to bright, our elements continuously surprise the viewer on a ride that ventures beyond the expected to examine complex questions about the future.

parameters.Title: Intel AI
parameters.Description:
For “AI on Intel” we told five real stories of Intel’s technology in action - from stopping poaching in Africa,
to powering world’s first face-controlled wheelchair, in each film we utilized
our key strengths by combining tech-inspired CG with cinematic live-action.
